attributes.action: Prevent an increase in air traffic through London City Airport
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
London City Airport has asked for planning permission to increase the number of flights throught LCA from 79,000 flights in 2007 to 120,000 in 2008. A 50% increase!
We have no peace for 6 1/2 days of the week and with this increase there will be earlier and late night flights too.
Also the local infrastructure of roads cannont cope with the increased traffic.
Please sign this petition to help stop this un-necessary increase in flights and the increase in environmental damage that this will cause.
